topics.body: Last week I forgot to lock the door to my room when I was preparing myself to jerk off. All of a sudden in the middle of my pleasure, my brother busted and caught me in the act. I'm worried he'll tell my mom or dad about it and I'll get "the talk." Any advice on how to prevent my brother from telling my parents?

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320f46b636872376c4b0000#post_5320f46b636872376c4b0000
[bq="twistedmetalero"]"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320f42f6368723d0a0c0000#post_5320f42f6368723d0a0c0000

are we roleplaying? i want to be the king of zimbabwe[/bq]
You know that raises a question:
Why doesn't someone buy out all of zimbabwe financially and become a benevolent dictator with the person mainly putting the money towards bettering the country and only once in a while pop your head out for a picture with the press as the entire country starts calling you their messiah?

I would be a pretty frickin badass villain with a world domination scheme; just use your money towards complete economic domination in third world countries then when they start to pull themselves out of poverty you take over another third world country with the profit you made.  Fifty years down the line you would control half the world.
